SELECT distinct t.id, t.node_code, t.node_name, t.node_type, t.definition_id, t.instance_id, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.tenant_id, t.flow_status, i.business_id, i.activity_status, d.flow_name, t.form_custom, t.form_path FROM flow_task AS t LEFT JOIN flow_user uu ON uu.associated = t.id LEFT JOIN flow_definition d on t.definition_id = d.id LEFT JOIN flow_instance i on t.instance_id = i.id
t.node_type = 1
AND uu.processed_by in
#{permission}
and t.node_code = #{task.nodeCode} and t.node_name like concat('%', #{task.nodeName}, '%')
and t.instance_id = #{task.instanceId}
order by t.create_time desc

SELECT b.create_by as approverUserId b.flow_status, b.business_id, a.create_time, b.node_name, b.id , d.flow_name FROM `flow_user` a LEFT JOIN flow_instance b ON a.associated = b.id LEFT JOIN flow_definition d on b.definition_id=d.id WHERE a.type = 4 and d.flow_name like concat('%', #{task.flowName}, '%')
and b.node_name like concat('%', #{task.nodeName}, '%')
and b.node_type = #{task.nodeType} ORDER BY create_time DESC
